presentation.description: Full Stack Developer and Azure Cloud Developer, expert in IT and new technologies.

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: Design and implementation of high-performance, secure, and scalable web and mobile applications using the latest technologies.

services.title: Software Design and Analysis
services.description: In-depth analysis of needs, drafting of technical and functional specifications, and design of custom software solutions.

services.title: Project Industrialization
services.description: Implementation of CI/CD pipelines, automation of tests and deployments, and management of development environments for continuous and reliable delivery.

services.title: Evolutionary and Corrective Maintenance
services.description: Continuous monitoring and improvement of applications, bug fixing, and adding new features to meet changing user needs.

services.title: Business Applications and Communication Sites
services.description: Development of specific business applications and communication websites to improve the visibility and efficiency of companies.

services.title: Training and Coaching
services.description: Training on .NET and React.js technologies, efficient software design, object-oriented programming, PostgreSQL and MongoDB databases. Personalized follow-up and step-by-step learning for all levels.
